Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to state appropriations to the state university of New York and the city university of New York
Summary: Clarifies that the SUNY health science centers are included in the maintenance of effort provision pursuant to chapter 260 of the laws of 2011.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to state appropriations to the state university of New York and the city university of New York
